dcterms:description: The BabyAI dataset is designed for grounded language learning, providing a benchmark for instruction-following tasks in a simulated environment where agents learn to understand and execute natural language commands.
dcterms:title: BabyAI

dcterms:creator: G. Cideron
M. Seurin
F. Strub
O. Pietquin
dcterms:description: Dsup is a dataset consisting of state-goal pairs harvested from successful trajectories of reinforcement learning agents, used to train instruction generators in the context of hindsight experience replay.
dcterms:title: Dsup

dcterms:creator: K. Denamgana√Ø
J. A. Walker
dcterms:description: The DRG (Referential Game Dataset) is a framework for studying language emergence and grounding in visual referential games, facilitating the exploration of how agents can develop communication protocols.
dcterms:title: DRG (Referential Game Dataset)
